label: knowledge
src_text: To my knowledge it will actually be worse or be distributed based on ability to wait your turn.
augmented_text: Based on my understanding, it appears the scenario could deteriorate or be divided according to one's capacity to wait their turn.

label: knowledge
src_text: A sad result of a mentality among some that " my ignorance is as good as your knowledge. "
augmented_text: It's unfortunate that there are people who believe their lack of knowledge holds the same value as someone else's expertise.

label: knowledge
src_text: I think sometimes it is better to lose on a platform you agree with than win on your enemy's ticket.
augmented_text: I believe we should stand firm with what we believe in, even if it resulted in a loss, instead of giving in to our opponent's agenda.

label: knowledge
src_text: Its only natural to consult you as the source when resolving our own contentions.
augmented_text: Your knowledge and understanding are always sought after when we're facing internal disputes.

label: knowledge
src_text: Hence I used my own experience to try and lend a different viewpoint to you.
augmented_text: Based on my own understanding, I thought it would be helpful to offer a distinct angle on the subject.

label: knowledge
src_text: Although I guess your only real AoE is Deathwing, plus one Entomb for clear, so that might be a struggle.
augmented_text: I see that Deathwing is your primary AoE source, with one Entomb for some clearance – could be a tough situation!

label: knowledge
src_text: I could explain that it's some sort of psychological compulsion Oh you mean the compulsion is having to say that.
augmented_text: Could it be the intellectual urge, when individuals feel obliged to showcase their expertise?

label: knowledge
src_text: I'm guessing if you squeeze it when empty, it creates suction.
augmented_text: From what I understand, compressing it when empty might produce a suction force.

label: knowledge
src_text: Everyone says networking which only works in my opinion if you know someone with a more local business.
augmented_text: Networking has been more beneficial for me when I've known someone involved in a nearby business.

label: knowledge
src_text: i'd be really uncomfortable using any service that you provide if i knew your mindset towards encounters like these.
augmented_text: Knowing how you react to situations like this, I wouldn't feel confident using any service you're involved in.

label: knowledge
src_text: I have my experience and knowledge telling me you ’ re a danger to self and others.
augmented_text: Having gained knowledge and experience on this topic, I can confidently say that your actions might cause harm to you and others nearby.

label: knowledge
src_text: It sounds to me like you did but I wasn't there.
augmented_text: It's plausible that you did, although I wasn't there to verify it.

label: knowledge
src_text: Add in petty condescension for good measure and yeah, people are naturally going to react to your being an asshole.
augmented_text: Dropping in subtle disdain can only prompt people to respond negatively to your ill-mannered attitude.

label: knowledge
src_text: I'm assuming you mean the teased spheres, as there's actually several cuts.
augmented_text: If you're talking about the paraboloids, there are numerous shapes available, you know?

label: knowledge
src_text: I thoroughly enjoy it, and you can get it for pretty cheap these days.
augmented_text: I truly relish it, and it can be acquired for a decent price at the moment.
